title: Creamy Garlic Parmesan Mushrooms
directions: In a medium sized skillet over medium high heat add the butter and olive oil. Add the mushrooms and garlic and saute until tender.
Add the heavy cream, parmesan cheese, cream cheese, italian seasoning, salt and pepper. Stir with the mushrooms and heat until the sauce is bubbly and smooth.
Serve immediately and garnish with fresh parsley.
ingredients: 8 Ounces white mushrooms, whole or sliced to preference
